subSections.title: Readings
Etymology
subSections.text:
{{wp|lang=ja|テイ宿}} {{wp|Root (Chinese constellation)}} {{wp|lang=ja|テイ (民族)}} {{wp|Di (Five Barbarians)}}
{{ja-kanjitab|てい|yomi=o}} From {{bor|ja|ltc|sort=てい|-}} {{ltc-l|氐|id=1}}, compare modern {{cog|cmn|氐|tr=dī}}. Used in {{w|Old Japanese}} as {{m|ja|借音|tr=shakuon}} ''kana'' for {{IPAfont|⟨te⟩}}.

subSections.title: Proper noun
